text: Stevan Edward Pearce (born August 24, 1947) is an American businessman and politician. He was the U.S. Representative for from 2011 to 2019. He is a member of the Republican Party. Pearce was the Republican nominee for Governor of New Mexico in the 2018 election. He lost general election to Michelle Lujan Grisham. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Businesspeople from Texas Category:Businesspeople from New Mexico Category:Politicians from New Mexico Category:Politicians from Texas Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Members of the New Mexico Legislature
title: Steve Pearce
